location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Another view of Mahmudiyeh' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:101 x 148 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘44’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView in Mahmudiyeh [Al Mahmudiyah], south of Baghdad. At left a café is occupied by several men and a carriage stands in the background.In the background at left an iwan-like entrance forms a break in the high white-washed wall that extends from left to centre.In the far distance groups of men can be seen.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'Another view of Mahmudiyeh'Pencil, above image at right: ‘44’;’22’
